    • Analysis with complex networks

recurrence_network

Source: R/recurrence_network.R
recurrence_network.Rd

Create recurrence network

recurrence_network(ts, eps)

Value

Recurrence network as igraph object.

Examples

recurrence_network(rnorm(100), 0.5)
#> IGRAPH 5f338fa D--- 100 2622 -- 
#> + edges from 5f338fa:
#>   [1] 1-> 1 1-> 2 1-> 4 1-> 6 1-> 7 1-> 8 1->11 1->14 1->25 1->26 1->28 1->29
#>  [13] 1->33 1->37 1->38 1->40 1->41 1->42 1->54 1->57 1->58 1->63 1->66 1->69
#>  [25] 1->71 1->77 1->79 1->87 1->92 1->93 1->94 2-> 1 2-> 2 2-> 3 2-> 4 2-> 6
#>  [37] 2-> 7 2-> 8 2->14 2->29 2->31 2->35 2->37 2->38 2->42 2->47 2->53 2->54
#>  [49] 2->58 2->63 2->66 2->67 2->69 2->72 2->77 2->78 2->79 2->81 2->82 2->92
#>  [61] 2->93 2->94 3-> 2 3-> 3 3-> 4 3-> 6 3-> 7 3->12 3->31 3->34 3->35 3->37
#>  [73] 3->42 3->47 3->49 3->53 3->54 3->66 3->67 3->72 3->78 3->81 3->82 3->93
#>  [85] 3->94 4-> 1 4-> 2 4-> 3 4-> 4 4-> 6 4-> 7 4-> 8 4->14 4->29 4->31 4->35
#>  [97] 4->37 4->42 4->47 4->53 4->54 4->58 4->63 4->66 4->67 4->72 4->77 4->78
#> + ... omitted several edges
